content: With His fierce and great and mighty sword,
And He will kill the dragon who  in the sea.
On that day the LORD will thresh from the flowing stream of the  River to the brook of Egypt, and you will be gathered up one by one, you sons of Israel.

It will come about also on that day that a great trumpet will be blown, and those who were perishing in the land of Assyria and who were scattered in the land of Egypt will come and worship the LORD on the holy mountain in Jerusalem.
